item.title: Ranvir Sandhu, Esq.
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
What Makes Attorney Ranvir Sandhu Uniquely Qualified To Represent You?
Attorney Ranvir is a dynamic, focused, and hard-working lawyer who values transparency and integrity. Ranvir is well versed in a wide variety of legal matters. Ranvir helps create professional estate plans that will satisfy individual and family members personal, financial, and tax goals utilizing robust, state of the art estate planning drafting systems and advanced technology and systems throughout every step. This includes the preparation of customized wills, trusts, power of attorneys, advance health care directives, and deed transfers. Ranvir also advises individuals, joint partnerships, startups, and emerging companies in tech and non-tech on corporate formation (LLCs and corporations in various states), M&A, financing, SAFEs and IPOs, general corporate counseling, as well as on non-corporate matters such as employment, licensing, securities compliance, and general corporate counseling. Prior to founding Insight Legal, Ranvir worked at renowned Bay Area law firms such as Cooley, DLA Piper, Fenwick & West, Pillsbury, and WilmerHale and also acted as in-house Corporate Counsel to Bay Area tech companies. His practice included the representation of technology, health care, biotechnology, life sciences, emerging growth companies, public companies, securities professionals, and investors in the wide variety of legal matters that affect their businesses; incorporations of LLCs, C Corps, and S Corps, dissolutions, mergers, acquisitions, financings and IPOs and securities compliance. As in-house counsel, Ranvir also reviewed and negotiated commercial software and hardware licensing agreements, trading agreements, SaaS and PaaS agreements, business partnerships, and distribution agreements. As a small and growing law firm and mainly due to his efficiency and one-on-one client approach, Ranvir and his team prepared hundreds of estate planning packages. Ranvir and his firm tailor their schedules to their clients everchanging needs and has often reprioritized client workload to meet those needs. For example, COVID-19 was and is still a great concern for many, Insight Legal established several estate plans done on a record turnround; be it due to travel needs abroad, desire to close a home purchase with a newly established trust as the owner, and many other types of urgent circumstances. Ranvir is fluent in Punjabi. He enjoys traveling and spending time with his family. He also has a passion for real estate; he has experience in renovating, designing, staging, and listing residential properties as a real estate broker.
Education
  • J.D - Lincoln Law School
  • B.A - University of California
Experience
  • Managing Attorney - Insight Legal, P.C. - (2019 - Present)
  • Corporate And Securities Attorney - OnCallCounsel, Inc. - (2018)
  • Corporate Counsel - TORA - (2015 - 2017)
  • Senior Corporate Paralegal - Cooley LLP - (2012 - 2015)
  • Corporate & Securities Attorney - DLA Piper LLP (US) - (2010 - 2012)

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Great Job! I had my Living Trust re-instated (re-done), and the Insight Legal Law Firm did a fantastic job. The communication from the first phone call to the final signing was straightforward. They use technology appropriately to avoid logistical delays in executing documents and in ensuring prompt firm-client discussions when needed. The entire process was smooth and was done quickly. At the in-person meeting, Ranvir Sandhu was extremely well prepared. The final binder documents (including a thumb drive of the documents with signatures) provided by Ranvir was well organized and easy to jump to various parts in estate plan document. Cannot say enough about how great my experience was. Ranvir and his team rock!! Thank you

- Appon

item.title: LewisMcDaniels
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
Redemption Period Assistance

The redemption period can make or break an investment. Our firm is equipped to step in should challenges arise involving homeowners, servicers, mortgage companies, and any other interested parties.

Negotiating on Your Behalf

Our strong negotiation skills ensure that you are getting the most out of your investment. Once you choose to invest, we speak with external parties on your behalf so that any roadblocks that may come up along the way can be avoided.

Management of Court Proceedings

The skilled attorneys at LewisMcDaniels manage every part of the tax lien foreclosure process from drafting the required documents and notices to the completion of all pleadings and motions.

Maximizing ROI

Your return on investment is a vital part of the tax sales process. Our firm gives you the peace of mind you deserve by ensuring that your investment is worth it.

Mitigation of Tax Sale Title Issues

Whatever issues may arise along the way, our competent team at LewisMcDaniels is here to come up with practical solutions so that we can successfully close on your investment.

Serving You In

Personal Injury Cases

Baton Rouge | Ascension | West Baton Rouge | Iberville | Livingston | St. Helena | East Feliciana | West Feliciana | Pointe Coupee

Our personal injury compensation lawyers are here to help you navigate the aftermath of your unexpected injury and the complex legal landscape that comes with it. We strive to secure the compensation you deserve, whether you've been injured in a trucking, car, or any other type of accident.

Car Accidents: Regardless of whether a simple fender-bender or a more severe collision, car accidents can significantly disrupt your life. Our team of car accident lawyers is committed to advocating for your rights and securing the full compensation you are entitled to.

Trucking Accidents: With our specialization in trucking accidents involving big-rig accidents, you can rely on us wholeheartedly. Handling the most complex and high-stakes situations, we know your case isn't just a game. Our trucking accident lawyers understand that trucking accidents often result in severe injuries and financial burdens, and we are here to help you obtain justice and fair compensation.

item.title: Service Section
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
Our employment lawyers handle labor and employment law cases across countless industries, including restaurants, retailers, contractors, service providers, and medical professionals.

We draw on our decades of experience dealing with state and federal law to position you for success. We have solid experience handling cases intersecting the following law:

  • Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA)
  • NY Labor Law (NYLL)
  • Family/Medical Leave (FMLA)
  • Health and Safety (OSHA)
  • Federal Collective Bargaining Labor Law (NLRA)
  • Mass Layoffs (WARN)
  • Unemployment Age Discrimination (ADEA)
  • Disability Discrimination (ADA)
  • Workplace Investigations
  • Traditional Labor Law Disputes
  • Arbitration
  • Meditation
  • And more

Additionally, we are able to provide guidance and consultation for management, offering comprehensive support in key areas such as training, developing employment policies, and implementing best practices. We understand the importance of equipping your organization with the tools and knowledge necessary to effectively manage your workforce and maintain a productive and compliant workplace.

Our construction lawyers protect your business interests, mitigate risks, and handle complex contracts unique to contractors, subcontractors, developers, and property owners. With us, your construction contracts are meticulously drafted, reviewed, and negotiated for fairness, enforceability, and protection of your interests.

We also guide and represent clients in construction disputes, analyzing situations, identifying legal remedies, and pursuing resolutions through negotiation, mediation, arbitration, or litigation.

Our business lawyers help make your company's growth and success a reality. From formation to mergers and acquisitions, we provide tailored legal guidance and minimize the risks you face. We understand today's competitive landscape and work closely with you to customize solutions that meet your needs.

When forming a business, we ensure you choose the proper legal structure, compliance, and maximized benefits. We protect your rights and interests when drafting contracts and negotiating, addressing key terms and risks while facilitating successful transactions. With strategic advice, unparalleled due diligence, and preemptively navigating regulatory matters, we set your mergers and acquisitions up for success.

Our discrimination lawyers are dedicated to fighting against workplace discrimination, understanding full well the profound impact it can have on individuals and businesses alike. If your company faces allegations of discrimination based on race, gender, age, disability, or any other protected characteristic, we are here to vigorously defend your rights and protect your reputation.

item.title: Content section
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
The Coren Law Group P.C. Difference

Choosing our firm ensures that you will receive exceptional service, unwavering support, and uninterrupted access to a lawyer who understands the practical aspects of your business. Our focus is on securing the most favorable outcome for you.

Specialized Service

Our focused practice areas allow us to provide highly specialized legal services tailored to your specific needs. We are well-versed in the intricacies of the law, enabling us to provide effective solutions for your legal concerns.

Client-Centric Approach 

We prioritize your needs and objectives. We take the time to listen, understand your unique circumstances, and provide personalized legal strategies that align with your goals. Your concerns are our concerns.

We understand that the best assistance happens when you need it, not when it's most convenient for the lawyer. We know the importance and urgency associated with investigations, lawsuits, and employee issues, particularly when the government or an aggressive plaintiff's lawyer gets involved. We understand the importance of time and aim to accommodate your schedule. Our flexible approach is tailored to minimize any disruptions to your business's day-to-day operations.

Track Record Of Success

Our team has a proven track record of achieving favorable client outcomes. We combine our legal expertise with strategic thinking to develop robust case strategies to secure the best possible results. While we can't guarantee success in any particular situation, our model of collaboration has resulted in positive outcomes.

Commitment To Excellence

We are committed to providing the best legal representation and service possible. Our attorneys stay up-to-date with the latest legal developments, ensuring that we offer cutting-edge solutions and effective advocacy for your legal matters. We care about and invest a lot in our support. When your business faces legal or administrative challenges, do what you do best and we will do what we do best.

item.title: Attorney Section
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
Meet The Attorney Dathan Hill

Mr. Manavi earned a Bachelor of Arts in Economics at the University of California, San Diego and completed his legal training at Loyola Law School in Los Angeles. During law school, Mr. Manavi was on staff at the Mani Brothers, LLC, a premier trophy-real estate group in Los Angeles.

After completing law school, Mr. Manavi spent a year in training in Century City law firms before founding Manavi Law Group, APLC in 2006. Since then, Mr. Manavi's practice has grown into the three areas where the firm practices: Business Litigation, Real Estate, and Criminal Defense.

item.title: Second Content Section
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
Our Core Competencies Are In The Following Practice Areas:

Business Law

Businesses sue each other over many different issues. Contracts are breached every day. Trade Secrets are stolen by employees and competitors alike. When this happens to your business, your first call must be to an attorney with experience resolving these matters informally, and if necessary, ready and able to take the other side to trial.

Real Estate

From a financial standpoint, any real estate transaction you perform will be one of the largest transactions of your life. A real estate agent is a requisite-- but that agent is biased and only gets paid if you close the deal. Having an impartial counsel assist you adds value to your transaction and confidence to your decisions.

Criminal Defense

You've been arrested, and you don't know what to do next. Step 1: Remain Silent! There is nothing you can say that will help you once the handcuffs are on. Step 2: Call Manavi Law Group, APLC.

item.title: Why Choose Us Sec
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
Why Choose The Law Office Of Dathan L. Hill?

Experience That Counts: With a decade of experience and a successful history of handling personal injury cases, our team of compensation lawyers is well-versed in the complexities of personal injury law. We vigorously advocate for you to achieve the outcome you deserve.

Law You Can Understand: The legal process is challenging, particularly in the aftermath of an accident. Our commitment to clear communication and personalized attention means we will be there to guide you through every step of the process.

Prompt Action: Time is critical in personal injury cases. We understand the significance of taking swift action, whether it involves preserving evidence, engaging with insurance companies, or preparing for potential litigation.

In-Depth Knowledge Of Personal Injury Compensation: We make it a priority to inform you of your rights and the possible compensation you may qualify for. Recognizing the individuality of each case, we customize our strategy to optimize your chances of receiving the full compensation you deserve.

Empathy & Compassion: We understand that the aftermath of an accident can be emotionally taxing. Here at The Law Office of Dathan L. Hill, we approach each case with empathy and genuine concern. Your well-being is important to us, and we are dedicated to offering the support you require during this challenging period.

Prompt & Thorough Investigations: In personal injury cases, evidence is key. Our team of accident injury lawyers work tirelessly to gather all relevant evidence, from accident reports to witness statements and medical records. This approach helps us construct the strongest possible case on your behalf.

Skilled Negotiation: While many personal injury cases are settled out of court, we don't back down from a courtroom battle if we feel it's in your best interest. Our negotiation skills have been honed through years of experience, allowing us to secure favorable settlements and verdicts that reflect the extent of your injuries and damages.

Medical Professionals At Your Fingertips: Understanding the medical aspects of your case is crucial. We collaborate with medical professionals to assess the full extent of your injuries, treatment options, and long-term consequences. This ensures that your claim accurately reflects your current and future medical needs.

item.title: About Section
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
About The Zorrilla Law Firm

Whether you are looking for the a jury trial or the best possible plea deal, our firm takes an aggressive approach in the courtroom. With a combined 16 years of experience, our partners know how to navigate the complexities of a criminal case in a way that is specifically tailored to each clients needs. The Zorrilla Law Firm knows that in criminal defense nothing is one size fits all and we take a personal and individualized approach to each case. Our partners utilize a vast network of experienced and hard-working experts and investigators to achieve an optimum outcome for each client.

Meet The Team

item.title: Meet Our Time Section
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
Meet the Team

Christina Zorrilla (PARTNER)

Founding member Christina Zorrillas excellence in criminal defense has been recognized by Super Lawyers and she was named one of Colorados Risings Stars in both 2021 and 2022. Christina has been practicing criminal defense law in Colorado since 2014. She began her career at the Office of the Colorado State Public Defenders Office where she received extensive training in the practice of criminal defense. During her time at the Public Defenders Office she completed 35 jury trials with a high rate of positive outcomes for her clients. Christinas trial experience ranges from misdemeanor DUI and Domestic Violence trials to felony matters including First Degree Murder and Sexual Assault trials.

Christina started the Zorrilla Law Firm in 2020 and continues to achieve outstanding results for her clients at the Firm, whether it be at trial, with dismissals or favorable plea deals.

Education

Chicago-Kent College of Law (2013)
Juris Doctor
University of San Diego (2008)
B.S. Finance

James Zorrilla (PARTNER)

Jim is the right attorney for any individual facing criminal allegations. His aggressive but coolheaded style has resulted in years of favorable outcomes for his clients, whether the goal is acquittal at trial or effective negotiations. Jim has dedicated his entire legal career to defending the criminally accused. He started his experience with the Homicide Task Force in Chicagos Cook County Public Defenders Office and transitioned to a trial attorney position with the Colorado State Public Defenders Office in 2013.

Known for being a forceful advocate, prepared and efficient, Jim is a well-respected member of the criminal defense community. Jim has had the experience of representing thousands of clients facing a wide range of criminal charges, from minor offenses to first-degree murder cases, including several high-profile cases. He has often been chosen to provide training to young criminal defense attorneys or specifically selected for cases requiring complex litigation skills.

Jim appreciates that when it comes to criminal allegations every case is serious and every client has specific needs. With each new client Jim brings the experience he has obtained throughout the years along with his endless drive to advocate for each individual client.

Education

Loyola University Chicago (2013)
Juris Doctor
University of Colorado (2009)
BA in Philosophy

item.title: Right Image Section
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
3 Things To Know About An Accident Before You Call Us

Secure The Scene Of The Accident

Prioritize your and any others' safety. Then, when possible, gather evidence at the scene. Take photos and gather contact information.

Seek Medical Attention

It's vital to seek medical attention promptly, even if your injuries appear minor. Some injuries may not manifest immediately, and even seemingly small injuries can lead to long-term issues. Your medical records will play a vital role as evidence in your case.

Dont Speak Freely With Insurance Companies

We strongly advise seeking legal counsel before engaging in discussions with an insurance company. Insurance companies may try to minimize their payout and later manipulate what you say to weaken your case.can lead to long-term issues.

item.title: Video section Theme 10
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
Customized Estate Planning For Every Family And Business 


[lc_function name="spk_video"]

Clients who desire high-quality legal services appreciate attention to detail, service that meets expectations, and superior subject matter expertise.

At Insight Legal, we deliver estate planning services that covers key areas such as living trusts, wills, powers of attorney, and advanced healthcare directives. Understanding the legal landscape can be complex; as your trusted advisor, we ensure you understand your rights so you can make the wisest decisions best for your unique situation.

Need assistance with corporate transactions? We also specialize in business law and the formation of LLCs, corporations, and various forms of other entities. We can also review and negotiate contracts, agreements, and SOWs. Dont let uncertainty or fear hinder your success. We will advise you and provide a legal path in the light most favorable to your unique situation and create a customized path to protect you and help you get where you wish.

item.content:encoded:

Insight Legal, P.C. is an in-network provider to many legal insurance plans for many Bay Area companies. Contact us and find out how you can utilize your employee legal insurance plan to complete your Estate Plan with Insight Legal.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost:10126.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Terms Of Use
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
1. Terms

By accessing this website, you are agreeing to be bound by these website Terms and Conditions of Use, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site. The materials contained in this website are protected by applicable copyright and trade mark law.

    1. modify or copy the materials
    2. use the materials for any commercial purpose, or for any public display (commercial or non-commercial)
    3. attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on Granados Law, website
    4. remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials or
    5. transfer the materials to another person or mirror the materials on any other server.
  2. This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by Granados Law, at any time. Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the termination of this license, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed format.

3. Disclaimer

The materials on Granados Law, website are provided as is. Granados Law, makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties, including without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights. Further, Granados Law, does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its Internet website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.

4. Limitations

In no event shall Granados Law, or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption,) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Granados Law, Internet site, even if Granados Law, or a Granados Law, authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.

5. Revisions and Errata

The materials appearing on Granados Law, website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Granados Law, does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete, or current. Granados Law, may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice. Granados Law, does not, however, make any commitment to update the materials.

6. Links

Granados Law, has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its Internet website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by Granados Law, of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the users own risk.

7. Site Terms of Use Modifications

Granados Law, may revise these terms of use for its website at any time without notice. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these Terms and Conditions of Use.

8. Governing Law

Any claim relating to Granados Law, website shall be governed by the laws of the State of Texas without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

item.title: Accessibility Statement
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
General

diaz-granadoslaw.com strives to ensure that its services are accessible to people with disabilities. diaz-granadoslaw.com has invested a significant amount of resources to help ensure that its website is made easier to use and more accessible for people with disabilities, with the strong belief that every person has the right to live with dignity, equality, comfort and independence.

Enabling The Accessibility Menu

diaz-granadoslaw.com accessibility menu can be enabled by clicking the accessibility menu icon that appears on the corner of the page. After triggering the accessibility menu, please wait a moment for the accessibility menu to load in its entirety.

Disclaimer

diaz-granadoslaw.com continues its efforts to constantly improve the accessibility of its site and services in the belief that it is our collective moral obligation to allow seamless, accessible and unhindered use also for those of us with disabilities.

Despite our efforts to make all pages and content on diaz-granadoslaw.com fully accessible, some content may not have yet been fully adapted to the strictest accessibility standards. This may be a result of not having found or identified the most appropriate technological solution.

Here For You

If you are experiencing difficulty with any content on diaz-granadoslaw.com or require assistance with any part of our site, please contact us during normal business hours as detailed below and we will be happy to assist.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Granados Law is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for all users. Read our accessibility statement to know more.
Granados Law is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for all users. Read our accessibility statement to know more.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
Your privacy is very important to us. Accordingly, we have developed this Policy in order for you to understand how we collect, use, communicate and disclose and make use of personal information. The following outlines our privacy policy.

  • Before or at the time of collecting personal information, we will identify the purposes for which information is being collected.
  • We will collect and use of personal information solely with the objective of fulfilling those purposes specified by us and for other compatible purposes, unless we obtain the consent of the individual concerned or as required by law.
  • We will only retain personal information as long as necessary for the fulfillment of those purposes.
  • We will collect personal information by lawful and fair means and, where appropriate, with the knowledge or consent of the individual concerned.
  • Personal data should be relevant to the purposes for which it is to be used, and, to the extent necessary for those purposes, should be accurate, complete, and up-to-date.
  • We will protect personal information by reasonable security safeguards against loss or theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
  • We will make readily available to customers information about our policies and practices relating to the management of personal information.

We are committed to conducting our business in accordance with these principles in order to ensure that the confidentiality of personal information is protected and maintained.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Learn about how Granados Law protects your privacy and personal information when using our website and legal services.
Learn about how Granados Law protects your privacy and personal information when using our website and legal services.

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost:10108.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Vehicle Injuries
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
Motor Vehicle Accidents

If you have been injured in an automobile crash, the attorneys at Granados & Associates are ready to defend you and protect your rights. In Houston, in one year alone, there were approximately 67,000 crashes. We aim to lessen the stress and burden of our clients who find themselves in an unfortunate auto accident.

Our job is to ensure that the insurance companies, medical facilities, governmental agencies, and opposing insurance defense counsel cooperate with our offices to protect our client's rights. Call us right now if you have any questions or think you are being mistreated!

 Bicycle Accidents 

As bikes are becoming a more popular form of transportation in Houston, bike lanes are being created so that bicyclists and drivers can more easily co-exist on the roads. If you are involved in an accident, you must call 911 to file a police report and call an ambulance, depending on the injuries sustained in the accident.

It would help if you took pictures of your bike and your injuries. It's also vital that you seek medical treatment as soon as possible and document all your medical expenses. If you're not sure what steps to take, contact us immediately!

Motorcycle Accidents

Unlike other motor vehicle accidents, there are several ways in which motorcycle accidents occur, at times due to circumstances that are directly the fault of the motorcycle driver's control. Motorcycle Accidents can be devastating as a rider is relatively unprotected against an oncoming car. The harm from such accidents can be life-changing regardless of whether the rider was wearing their helmet.

Injuries sustained in such an accident can lead to reduced earnings, medical expenses, the need for future medical care, and a reduced ability to enjoy life. Don't wait. Call if you have questions.

Victims of Drunk Driving

Few things are as irresponsible as getting behind the wheel of a car after drinking. Unfortunately, drunk driving occurs regularly in Texas and throughout the United States.

While many attorneys make their living by representing reckless drivers in criminal court, our firm believes that the victims of such a crime should also be protected in civil court. If you have been a drunk driver's victim, contact our office today to speak with our Texas injury lawyers.


[lc_get_post post_type="lc_section" slug="johnsonbox"]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Involved in a vehicle-related accident? Our experienced legal team is always ready to protect your rights and pursue your rightful claim.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Dealing with personal injuries? Trust our compassionate legal advocates in Houston Texas to fight for your rights and fair compensation.

item.title: General Injuries
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
Spinal Injuries

Spinal injuries can have a lasting impact on one's life, and such injuries can lead to paralysis, paraplegia, reduced motor skills, and chronic pain. These injuries may require repeated surgeries, ongoing treatment, physical therapy, and possibly joint fusion.

If you or a loved one have suffered spinal damage due to another's negligent or reckless acts, legal representation is required. We provide a high level of service to every one of our clients and will strive to move your case forward quickly.

Head Injuries

A life-changing head injury can occur within a matter of seconds. One blow to the head can cause lasting harm. This harm may include trauma, brain damage, reduced motor skills, slurred speech, vertigo, hindered vision, etc. Those harmed by such injuries often need extensive and ongoing medical care, and the victim will need to be compensated for this care and the injury itself.

Our Houston area injury lawyers assist head injury victims throughout Texas who have been harmed due to another's negligence. Contact our office today for a consultation with our attorneys.

Paralysis

Becoming paralyzed is worse than any other injury except for those involving death. Nothing can reduce one's ability to enjoy life more than being unable to perform basic tasks such as exercising, walking with one's family, or enjoying outdoor activities. Unfortunately, those paralyzed due to negligence will never enjoy such actions again.

Our Texas personal injury lawyers represent those who have become paralyzed through no fault. Contact us today to speak with an attorney.

Pedestrian Accidents

Pedestrian accidents typically occur in highly-populated areas; most of these accidents can be attributed to negligent driving. We have been helping Texas residents battle large corporations and insurance companies for twenty years. We fight to secure the financial future of families who have lost a loved one or individuals who have been seriously injured.

Slip & Fall

When someone enters a facility, that person reasonably expects it's safe. Unfortunately, there are times when the owners or operators of such premises do not adequately care for the facility.

If another's negligence has caused you to slip and trip and has caused you to become injured, please don't hesitate to contact Granados and Associates to help you navigate this legal nightmare. Depending on the seriousness of your injuries, you should file a personal injury claim as soon as possible. It would help if you got the proper medical care and legal advice.

 Dog Bites 

There are about five million animal attacks in a single year in the US alone. Despite the alarming numbers, insurance companies fail to recognize the severity of these dog bites cases.

You must contact experienced attorneys who have dealt with similar cases and who can advise you of your next steps. Animal control will need to be notified, as well as the owner of the dog, and the proper investigation will have to be conducted to take appropriate action on the dog and its owner.

[lc_get_post post_type="lc_section" slug="johnsonbox"]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Suffered general injuries? Our expert legal team can help you seek the compensation and justice you deserve. Contact us now.

item.title: Wrongful Death
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
Wrongful death is defined as the negligent actions of a person, business, organization, or entity. If a loved one has suffered a wrongful death, you are probably full of questions and need legal advice. Several different claims can lead to wrongful death, such as Malfunctioning auto cars; there are over 50 million auto recalls every year, and most of them are attributed to safety protocol for your vehicles.

[lc_get_post post_type="lc_section" slug="johnsonbox"]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Coping with a wrongful death? Our compassionate attorneys in Houston Texas provide dedicated support and legal guidance during this difficult time.

item.title: Commercial Injuries
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
Commercial Vehicle Accidents

Granados and Associates are prepared to fight for you if you have been injured in a commercial vehicle accident. The damage from a larger vehicle/truck can be devastating, and these accidents can result in serious injuries such as head trauma, spinal damage, paralysis, or even death.

These cases can become highly complicated, especially when dealing with multiple parties who may be responsible. This is why you must have excellent legal representation looking out for you.

 Bus & Rail Accidents

Accidents involving Metropolitan Transportation Authority (CapMetro) buses or MetroRail trains are more common. The nature of public transportation makes the vehicles used potentially more dangerous than a typical car, and this increased danger leads to a greater risk of injury.

Texas area residents injured in such accidents should immediately contact a personal injury lawyer. Bringing a claim against the correct entities can be complicated, and you need an attorney experienced in this area of law to assist you with the process.

Construction Accidents

Texas construction sites can be dangerous places. You may be performing your job, and, unexpectedly, accidents occur. Job site accidents can result in serious injury and even death.

Many people believe that they are limited to remedies offered by the Worker's Compensation system when they are harmed on a job site. Texas, however, allows some employers to "opt-out" of the worker's comp system. Construction workers who are employed by such a company may file a lawsuit directly against their employer when they have been injured on the job.

Oil Field Injuries

Texas is home to many in the oil and energy industries, and oil has proven to be a great source of employment for our state over the years. However, it must be understood that such type of work is often performed in dangerous conditions.

Such conditions can result in serious injuries and leave the victim requiring ongoing care while suffering a reduced ability to earn money. Contact our Texas injury lawyers today if you or a loved one have been injured in an oil-related accident.

[lc_get_post post_type="lc_section" slug="johnsonbox"]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Facing commercial injuries? Our legal advocates are experienced in handling business-related accidents and will fight for your best interests.

All of our attorneys are aggressive, result driven, and passionate about fighting for and protecting all of our clients rights. Moreover, when you hire the law firm of Granados & Associates, you gain decades of legal experience in your counsel fighting for your freedom. WE KNOW THE LAW AND WANT TO HELP YOU GET JUSTICE.

item.title: Firm Overview
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
With extensive experience across a wide range of personal injuries, we represent individuals throughout the United States who have suffered from serious injuries, death, and other damages due to poorly designed or manufactured products, dangerous drugs, automobile, and trucking accidents, on-the-job accidents, and toxic and environmental exposure to hazardous substances. 

Our experienced lawyers zealously pursue every case to ensure that our clients receive their rightful compensation.

item.title: Tomas Lopez
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
Attorney

Mr. Lopez is a zealous advocate for the wrongfully accused. His passion for justice guides him in every aspect of his representation. His keen intellect and expansive knowledge of the law make him a formidable criminal defense attorney whose only goal is securing the best outcome for his clients. He has secured countless dismissals and reductions for hundreds of his clients by using top-tier negotiating skills. Before attending law school in Florida, Mr. Lopez received a Bachelor of Arts in Psychology and a Bachelor of Arts in English Literature from the University of Houston. He was born and raised in south Texas and is a devout husband and father. He is a fierce competitor on the golf course, and it is there that he has learned many of the same attributes that are necessary to be successful at all levels in life.

Practice Areas

  • Criminal Defense
  • Admissions and Affiliations
  • State Bar of Texas
  • Houston Bar Association

Karen works closely with every client who walks through the door at Granados and Associates.

Karen plays an important role and is a major team player for the firm and our clients.

item.title: What Is Lorem Ipsum?
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded:
What Is Lorem Ipsum?

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.., comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.

Why Do We Use It?

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using Content here, content here, making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for lorem ipsum will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).

It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. item.title: Venkat
item.dc:creator: spk-admin
item.content:encoded: We needed a trust and hired Ranvir through our legal plan. He did a great job and in fact followed up to ensure our trust is amended after we bought the house. A generous and professional team works for him. I would recommend him to anyone who wants to leverage legal services.
